trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form.InputLanguageChanging"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representerar den metod som hanterar den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form.InputLanguageChanging"> </xref> händelse av en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When you create an InputLanguageChangingEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: När du skapar en InputLanguageChangingEventHandler delegat kan identifiera den metod som hanterar händelsen.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Lägga till en instans av delegaten händelsen om du vill associera händelsen med din händelsehanterare.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Händelsehanteraren anropas när händelsen inträffar, om du tar bort delegaten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events with delegates, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information om hur du hanterar händelser med ombud finns [händelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
